column5: The Cherry Creek Private Retreat is your own personal corner of Austin's welcoming, natural zen space. A clean hotel-like ambiance with fun accents, a lush and peaceful outdoor sitting area, and a gorgeous slate rain shower set this luxurious private bed/bath apart. 15 minutes or less away from downtown, the airport, Town Lake, the greenbelt, and Barton Springs; just 30 minutes from Circuit of the Americas and the San Marcos Outlet Mall.
